00036 /* UV Project modifier: Generates UVs projected from an object */
00037 
00038 #include "DNA_meshdata_types.h"
00039 #include "DNA_camera_types.h"
00040 #include "DNA_object_types.h"
00041 #include "DNA_scene_types.h"
00042 
00043 #include "BLI_math.h"
00044 #include "BLI_string.h"
00045 #include "BLI_uvproject.h"

00059 static void initData(ModifierData *md)
00060 {
00061     UVProjectModifierData *umd = (UVProjectModifierData*) md;
00062     int i;
00063 
00064     for (i = 0; i < MOD_UVPROJECT_MAXPROJECTORS; ++i)
00065         umd->projectors[i] = NULL;
00066     umd->image = NULL;
00067     umd->flags = 0;
00068     umd->num_projectors = 1;
00069     umd->aspectx = umd->aspecty = 1.0f;
00070     umd->scalex = umd->scaley = 1.0f;
00071 }
00072 
00073 static void copyData(ModifierData *md, ModifierData *target)
00074 {
00075     UVProjectModifierData *umd = (UVProjectModifierData*) md;
00076     UVProjectModifierData *tumd = (UVProjectModifierData*) target;
00077     int i;
00078 
00079     for (i = 0; i < MOD_UVPROJECT_MAXPROJECTORS; ++i)
00080         tumd->projectors[i] = umd->projectors[i];
00081     tumd->image = umd->image;
00082     tumd->flags = umd->flags;
00083     tumd->num_projectors = umd->num_projectors;
00084     tumd->aspectx = umd->aspectx;
00085     tumd->aspecty = umd->aspecty;
00086     tumd->scalex = umd->scalex;
00087     tumd->scaley = umd->scaley;
00088     BLI_strncpy(tumd->uvlayer_name, umd->uvlayer_name, sizeof(umd->uvlayer_name));
00089 }
00090 
00091 static CustomDataMask requiredDataMask(Object *UNUSED(ob), ModifierData *UNUSED(md))
00092 {
00093     CustomDataMask dataMask = 0;
00094 
00095     /* ask for UV coordinates */
00096     dataMask |= CD_MASK_MTFACE;
00097 
00098     return dataMask;
00099 }
00100 
00101 static void foreachObjectLink(ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00102         ObjectWalkFunc walk, void *userData)
00103 {
00104     UVProjectModifierData *umd = (UVProjectModifierData*) md;
00105     int i;
00106 
00107     for (i = 0; i < MOD_UVPROJECT_MAXPROJECTORS; ++i)
00108         walk(userData, ob, &umd->projectors[i]);
00109 }
00110 
00111 static void foreachIDLink(ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00112                         IDWalkFunc walk, void *userData)
00113 {
00114     UVProjectModifierData *umd = (UVProjectModifierData*) md;
00115 
00116     walk(userData, ob, (ID **)&umd->image);
00117 
00118     foreachObjectLink(md, ob, (ObjectWalkFunc)walk,
00119                         userData);
00120 }
00121 
00122 static void updateDepgraph(ModifierData *md, DagForest *forest,
00123                         struct Scene *UNUSED(scene),
00124                         Object *UNUSED(ob),
00125                         DagNode *obNode)
00126 {
00127     UVProjectModifierData *umd = (UVProjectModifierData*) md;
00128     int i;
00129 
00130     for (i = 0; i < umd->num_projectors; ++i) {
00131         if (umd->projectors[i]) {
00132             DagNode *curNode = dag_get_node(forest, umd->projectors[i]);
00133 
00134             dag_add_relation(forest, curNode, obNode,
00135                      DAG_RL_DATA_DATA | DAG_RL_OB_DATA, "UV Project Modifier");
00136         }
00137     }
00138 }
00139 
00140 typedef struct Projector {
00141     Object *ob;             /* object this projector is derived from */
00142     float projmat[4][4];    /* projection matrix */ 
00143     float normal[3];        /* projector normal in world space */
00144     void *uci;              /* optional uv-project info (panorama projection) */
00145 } Projector;
00146 
00147 static DerivedMesh *uvprojectModifier_do(UVProjectModifierData *umd,
00148                      Object *ob, DerivedMesh *dm)
00149 {
00150     float (*coords)[3], (*co)[3];
00151     MLoopUV *mloop_uv;
00152     MTexPoly *mtexpoly, *mt = NULL;
00153     int i, numVerts, numPolys, numLoops;
00154     Image *image = umd->image;
00155     MPoly *mpoly, *mp;
00156     MLoop *mloop;
00157     int override_image = ((umd->flags & MOD_UVPROJECT_OVERRIDEIMAGE) != 0);
00158     Projector projectors[MOD_UVPROJECT_MAXPROJECTORS];
00159     int num_projectors = 0;
00160     float aspect;
00161     char uvname[MAX_CUSTOMDATA_LAYER_NAME];
00162     float aspx= umd->aspectx ? umd->aspectx : 1.0f;
00163     float aspy= umd->aspecty ? umd->aspecty : 1.0f;
00164     float scax= umd->scalex ? umd->scalex : 1.0f;
00165     float scay= umd->scaley ? umd->scaley : 1.0f;
00166     int free_uci= 0;
00167 
00168     aspect = aspx / aspy;
00169 
00170     for (i = 0; i < umd->num_projectors; ++i)
00171         if (umd->projectors[i])
00172             projectors[num_projectors++].ob = umd->projectors[i];
00173 
00174     if (num_projectors == 0) return dm;
00175 
00176     /* make sure there are UV Maps available */
00177 
00178     if (!CustomData_has_layer(&dm->loopData, CD_MLOOPUV)) return dm;
00179 
00180     /* make sure we're using an existing layer */
00181     CustomData_validate_layer_name(&dm->loopData, CD_MLOOPUV, umd->uvlayer_name, uvname);
00182 
00183     /* calculate a projection matrix and normal for each projector */
00184     for (i = 0; i < num_projectors; ++i) {
00185         float tmpmat[4][4];
00186         float offsetmat[4][4];
00187         Camera *cam = NULL;
00188         /* calculate projection matrix */
00189         invert_m4_m4(projectors[i].projmat, projectors[i].ob->obmat);
00190 
00191         projectors[i].uci= NULL;
00192 
00193         if (projectors[i].ob->type == OB_CAMERA) {
00194             
00195             cam = (Camera *)projectors[i].ob->data;
00196             if (cam->flag & CAM_PANORAMA) {
00197                 projectors[i].uci= project_camera_info(projectors[i].ob, NULL, aspx, aspy);
00198                 project_camera_info_scale(projectors[i].uci, scax, scay);
00199                 free_uci= 1;
00200             }
00201             else {
00202                 float sensor= camera_sensor_size(cam->sensor_fit, cam->sensor_x, cam->sensor_y);
00203                 int sensor_fit= camera_sensor_fit(cam->sensor_fit, aspx, aspy);
00204                 float scale= (cam->type == CAM_PERSP) ? cam->clipsta * sensor / cam->lens : cam->ortho_scale;
00205                 float xmax, xmin, ymax, ymin;
00206 
00207                 if (sensor_fit==CAMERA_SENSOR_FIT_HOR) {
00208                     xmax = 0.5f * scale;
00209                     ymax = xmax / aspect;
00210                 }
00211                 else {
00212                     ymax = 0.5f * scale;
00213                     xmax = ymax * aspect;
00214                 }
00215 
00216                 xmin = -xmax;
00217                 ymin = -ymax;
00218 
00219                 /* scale the matrix */
00220                 xmin *= scax;
00221                 xmax *= scax;
00222                 ymin *= scay;
00223                 ymax *= scay;
00224 
00225                 if (cam->type == CAM_PERSP) {
00226                     float perspmat[4][4];
00227                     perspective_m4( perspmat,xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax, cam->clipsta, cam->clipend);
00228                     mult_m4_m4m4(tmpmat, perspmat, projectors[i].projmat);
00229                 }
00230                 else { /* if (cam->type == CAM_ORTHO) */
00231                     float orthomat[4][4];
00232                     orthographic_m4( orthomat,xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax, cam->clipsta, cam->clipend);
00233                     mult_m4_m4m4(tmpmat, orthomat, projectors[i].projmat);
00234                 }
00235             }
00236         }
00237         else {
00238             copy_m4_m4(tmpmat, projectors[i].projmat);
00239         }
00240 
00241         unit_m4(offsetmat);
00242         mul_mat3_m4_fl(offsetmat, 0.5);
00243         offsetmat[3][0] = offsetmat[3][1] = offsetmat[3][2] = 0.5;
00244         
00245         if (cam) {
00246             if (aspx == aspy) { 
00247                 offsetmat[3][0] -= cam->shiftx;
00248                 offsetmat[3][1] -= cam->shifty;
00249             }
00250             else if (aspx < aspy) {
00251                 offsetmat[3][0] -=(cam->shiftx * aspy/aspx);
00252                 offsetmat[3][1] -= cam->shifty;
00253             }
00254             else {
00255                 offsetmat[3][0] -= cam->shiftx;
00256                 offsetmat[3][1] -=(cam->shifty * aspx/aspy);
00257             }
00258         }
00259         
00260         mult_m4_m4m4(projectors[i].projmat, offsetmat, tmpmat);
00261 
00262         /* calculate worldspace projector normal (for best projector test) */
00263         projectors[i].normal[0] = 0;
00264         projectors[i].normal[1] = 0;
00265         projectors[i].normal[2] = 1;
00266         mul_mat3_m4_v3(projectors[i].ob->obmat, projectors[i].normal);
00267     }
00268 
00269     numPolys = dm->getNumPolys(dm);
00270     numLoops = dm->getNumLoops(dm);
00271 
00272     /* make sure we are not modifying the original UV map */
00273     mloop_uv = CustomData_duplicate_referenced_layer_named(&dm->loopData,
00274             CD_MLOOPUV, uvname, numLoops);
00275 
00276     /* can be NULL */
00277     mt = mtexpoly = CustomData_duplicate_referenced_layer_named(&dm->polyData,
00278             CD_MTEXPOLY, uvname, numPolys);
00279 
00280     numVerts = dm->getNumVerts(dm);
00281 
00282     coords = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*coords) * numVerts,
00283                  "uvprojectModifier_do coords");
00284     dm->getVertCos(dm, coords);
00285 
00286     /* convert coords to world space */
00287     for (i = 0, co = coords; i < numVerts; ++i, ++co)
00288         mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, *co);
00289     
00290     /* if only one projector, project coords to UVs */
00291     if (num_projectors == 1 && projectors[0].uci==NULL)
00292         for (i = 0, co = coords; i < numVerts; ++i, ++co)
00293             mul_project_m4_v3(projectors[0].projmat, *co);
00294 
00295     mpoly = dm->getPolyArray(dm);
00296     mloop = dm->getLoopArray(dm);
00297 
00298     /* apply coords as UVs, and apply image if tfaces are new */
00299     for (i = 0, mp = mpoly; i < numPolys; ++i, ++mp, ++mt) {
00300         if (override_image || !image || (mtexpoly == NULL || mt->tpage == image)) {
00301             if (num_projectors == 1) {
00302                 if (projectors[0].uci) {
00303                     unsigned int fidx= mp->totloop - 1;
00304                     do {
00305                         unsigned int lidx= mp->loopstart + fidx;
00306                         unsigned int vidx= mloop[lidx].v;
00307                         project_from_camera(mloop_uv[lidx].uv, coords[vidx], projectors[0].uci);
00308                     } while (fidx--);
00309                 }
00310                 else {
00311                     /* apply transformed coords as UVs */
00312                     unsigned int fidx= mp->totloop - 1;
00313                     do {
00314                         unsigned int lidx= mp->loopstart + fidx;
00315                         unsigned int vidx= mloop[lidx].v;
00316                         copy_v2_v2(mloop_uv[lidx].uv, coords[vidx]);
00317                     } while (fidx--);
00318                 }
00319             }
00320             else {
00321                 /* multiple projectors, select the closest to face normal direction */
00322                 float face_no[3];
00323                 int j;
00324                 Projector *best_projector;
00325                 float best_dot;
00326 
00327                 /* get the untransformed face normal */
00328                 mesh_calc_poly_normal_coords(mp, mloop + mp->loopstart, (const float (*)[3])coords, face_no);
00329 
00330                 /* find the projector which the face points at most directly
00331                  * (projector normal with largest dot product is best)
00332                  */
00333                 best_dot = dot_v3v3(projectors[0].normal, face_no);
00334                 best_projector = &projectors[0];
00335 
00336                 for (j = 1; j < num_projectors; ++j) {
00337                     float tmp_dot = dot_v3v3(projectors[j].normal,
00338                             face_no);
00339                     if (tmp_dot > best_dot) {
00340                         best_dot = tmp_dot;
00341                         best_projector = &projectors[j];
00342                     }
00343                 }
00344 
00345                 if (best_projector->uci) {
00346                     unsigned int fidx= mp->totloop - 1;
00347                     do {
00348                         unsigned int lidx= mp->loopstart + fidx;
00349                         unsigned int vidx= mloop[lidx].v;
00350                         project_from_camera(mloop_uv[lidx].uv, coords[vidx], best_projector->uci);
00351                     } while (fidx--);
00352                 }
00353                 else {
00354                     unsigned int fidx= mp->totloop - 1;
00355                     do {
00356                         unsigned int lidx= mp->loopstart + fidx;
00357                         unsigned int vidx= mloop[lidx].v;
00358                         float tco[3];
00359 
00360                         copy_v3_v3(tco, coords[vidx]);
00361                         mul_project_m4_v3(best_projector->projmat, tco);
00362                         copy_v2_v2(mloop_uv[lidx].uv, tco);
00363 
00364                     } while (fidx--);
00365                 }
00366             }
00367         }
00368 
00369         if (override_image && mtexpoly) {
00370             mt->tpage = image;
00371         }
00372     }
00373 
00374     MEM_freeN(coords);
00375     
00376     if (free_uci) {
00377         int j;
00378         for (j = 0; j < num_projectors; ++j) {
00379             if (projectors[j].uci) {
00380                 MEM_freeN(projectors[j].uci);
00381             }
00382         }
00383     }
00384 
00385     /* Mark tessellated CD layers as dirty. */
00386     dm->dirty |= DM_DIRTY_TESS_CDLAYERS;
00387 
00388     return dm;
00389 }
00390 
00391 static DerivedMesh *applyModifier(ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00392                         DerivedMesh *derivedData,
00393                         int UNUSED(useRenderParams),
00394                         int UNUSED(isFinalCalc))
00395 {
00396     DerivedMesh *result;
00397     UVProjectModifierData *umd = (UVProjectModifierData*) md;
00398 
00399     result = uvprojectModifier_do(umd, ob, derivedData);
00400 
00401     return result;
00402 }
00403 
00404 static DerivedMesh *applyModifierEM(ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00405                         struct BMEditMesh *UNUSED(editData),
00406                         DerivedMesh *derivedData)
00407 {
00408     return applyModifier(md, ob, derivedData, 0, 1);
00409 }

00412 ModifierTypeInfo modifierType_UVProject = {
00413     /* name */              "UVProject",
00414     /* structName */        "UVProjectModifierData",
00415     /* structSize */        sizeof(UVProjectModifierData),
00416     /* type */              eModifierTypeType_NonGeometrical,
00417     /* flags */             eModifierTypeFlag_AcceptsMesh
00418                             | eModifierTypeFlag_SupportsMapping
00419                             | eModifierTypeFlag_SupportsEditmode
00420                             | eModifierTypeFlag_EnableInEditmode,
00421 
00422     /* copyData */          copyData,
00423     /* deformVerts */       NULL,
00424     /* deformMatrices */    NULL,
00425     /* deformVertsEM */     NULL,
00426     /* deformMatricesEM */  NULL,
00427     /* applyModifier */     applyModifier,
00428     /* applyModifierEM */   applyModifierEM,
00429     /* initData */          initData,
00430     /* requiredDataMask */  requiredDataMask,
00431     /* freeData */          NULL,
00432     /* isDisabled */        NULL,
00433     /* updateDepgraph */    updateDepgraph,
00434     /* dependsOnTime */     NULL,
00435     /* dependsOnNormals */  NULL,
00436     /* foreachObjectLink */ foreachObjectLink,
00437     /* foreachIDLink */     foreachIDLink,
00438     /* foreachTexLink */    NULL,
00439 };
